This is an absolute must if you go to Barcelona.  The market which this food stand is located is a great place to visit but my destination is El Quim.  It's like getting high end food in a food stall.  The two dishes that really stood out were the wild mushrooms topped with a fried egg and seared foie gras, and steak topped with black truffles.  Amazing taste and cooked perfectly.  Getting a seat is a bit challenging but if you hover and order a drink while you wait, the staff usually will help you claim a seat.  The food is really good and the staff is friendly.
